titleInfo.title: University of Tennessee record, volume 61, number 3

mods.abstract: This publication contains the general catalog for 1958-1960 for the University of Tennessee. It includes the Board of Trustees members, general information about admission, faculty members, the curriculum, and session calendar, and index.

mods.abstract: This publication contains the graduate school catalog for 1971-1972 for the University of Tennessee.
